actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to intervene in "American Postal Workers Union, AFL-CIO, et al. v. United States of America" and "American Federation of Government Employees, AFL-CIO, et al. v. United States of America".

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to intervene in the name of the Senate in the cases of American Postal Workers Union, AFL-CIO, et al. v. United States of America and of American Federation of Government Employees, AFL-CIO, et al. v. United States of America (both cases relating to the constitutionality of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act)).

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to intervene in "American Postal Workers Union, AFL-CIO, et al. v. United States of America" and "American Federation of Government Employees, AFL-CIO, et al. v. United States of America".
